alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 13 at 8:10AM EDT until further notice by NWS Albany
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Albany NY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Connecticut... Still River At Brookfield affecting Fairfield and Litchfield Counties. The next statement will be issued this evening at 815 PM EDT. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Still River at Brookfield. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, The river begins to flood roads and parking lots. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM EDT Wednesday the stage was 10.0 feet. - . - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning and continue rising to a crest of 13.9 feet late this evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 14.6 feet on 10/15/2005. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Still River Brookfield Flood Stage: 12.0 Observed Stage at Wed 7 am: 10.0 Forecast: Wed 8 am MSG Wed 2 pm 13.1 Wed 8 pm 13.9 Thu 2 am 13.7 Thu 8 am 13.0 Thu 2 pm 12.4 Thu 8 pm 12.1 &&
